participant_1.background:
I'm a cook who loves cooking seafood and dressing up for Halloween.
I'm a family person and I love to spend time with my kids.
pop is my favorite music.
I'm not good at keeping up with my family, but I always stay in touch with my dog.
i am not a nice person.

participant_2.background:
I have been going to the park a lot more often because my daughter loves to play there.
I keep to myself because I am afraid of being judged.
i like to read books.
I'm afraid of losing my cat, because he's my best friend and I don't know what I would do without him.
I'm a potter, and I also enjoy photographing my everyday life.

content.text: I'm doing well. How are you?
I'm good. I'm a cook and I love to cook seafood. What do you do for a living?
I'm a potter and I also enjoy photographing my everyday life.
That's cool. I've never been to a potter's studio before. What's it like?
It's really fun. I get to make things out of clay and I can also paint them.
That sounds really cool. I'm not very artistic but I'd love to try it sometime.
You should! It's a lot of fun and you can make some really cool things.
I might just do that. Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem. Are you married or have any kids?
I'm married and I have two kids.
Oh that's great. I have a daughter and she's my best friend.
That's awesome. I love spending time with my kids.
Me too. They're the best part of my life.
I agree. They make life worth living.
